Body:
Description: Hi all,

since the last update we have discovered that the OTP fuction does not work proberly.
We can create OTP's but once you try to redeem it the Client says that the OTP is wrong.
Sometimes it works but most of the time it does not.
What We've Learned Updated: OTP did not apply correctly to the EPp client
Next Steps Updated: CUstoemr updated the client to 6.2.4.2.
